scenario_text.value:
(It’s obvious how screwy things are between
Shuuji and Lopmon, even from the outside.)
(I wonder how Saki and Floramon are doing?)
Hyaaah!
Oof!
Oh, good one, Floramon!
(Those two are playing volleyball?)

Yah! ...Ah, sorry! Didn’t mean to send it
that way!
Leave it to me!

Whoa, you can stretch your tendril! Nice one,
Floramon!
Ah, this is nothing.
You two look like you’re having fun.
Oh, it’s you, Takuma! And Agumon!
Hidey-ho!
Hey there, Agumon.

Just so you know, this isn’t a game we’re
playing here.
I didn’t say anything... What is this, then?

Hmm, like a physical exam for Floramon? Just
figured I should know what she can do.

Huh. Can’t say I expected such a serious
answer.
Rude. I’m always serious!

No telling what’s coming for us, so we should
get ready however we can, right?

Is it my imagination...or are you enjoying
this?

Ha, saw right through me? I can’t keep
a thing from you.

If I’m being honest, it’s...enough for me
just being here, alive and kicking.
Enough just being here...

That may be a bit tactless of me, so I can’t
say it in front of the others.

(I can see that. If Shuuji or Aoi heard,
I imagine they’d get mad or scold her.)

(Minoru or Miu would agree, I bet. The three
of them would get along like gangbusters.)

(As for me, I’m not sure. I haven’t had time
to consider if things are fun or scary.)
(I think Saki’s words seem...)
Tactless, actually.
Fine, I think.
Hard to understand.

Yeah, it’s pretty tactless. You better not
say that in front of Shuuji or Aoi.

Right? Aoi might try to hear me out, but
Shuuji would totally blow his top I think.

Oh yeah, totally. You’ve got those two
pegged.

I really couldn’t deal! Straightlaced types
are fine and all, but hear a girl out!

All right, all right... I get it, you don’t
need to go that far.

What’s wrong with that? I bet Minoru or Miu
would say the same thing.

Oh, totally! Minoru’s dumb as a box of rocks,
but Miu seems like a kindred spirit.

Poor Minoru... What did you mean about Miu,
though?

Hmm, how can I put it. Like we’re both
carrying a heavy burden?
A burden? Like what?
It’s fine. Don’t worry about it.

Yeah, if I get a chance I’d like to make
friends with that kid.
To be honest, I’m not really sure.
You’re not sure? What do you mean?
Whether what you’re saying is tactless.

I’ve just been so preoccupied with my own
stuff, I haven’t thought about my feelings.
Is that right... Sure, I can see that.
Not the answer you were looking for?
Oh no, I get what you’re saying.
I might be in your position soon enough...

Let’s see, what’s next on my list? And you,
Takuma—what should you be doing?
Now is all we have, right?
Um, I guess...

(Saki’s smiling, but why do I feel like she’s
hiding something...?)

Hey Takuma, don’t you think you have
something you should be doing?
